new_skill_specs.name: deduce_population_impact
new_skill_specs.purpose: To deduce the impact on a population based on a given scenario and map it to a multiple-choice option.

tests.input: ('All spider eggs are eaten by predators, affecting adult spider population', [{'label': 'A', 'text': 'Adult spider population would remain the same'}, {'label': 'B', 'text': 'Adult spider population would double.'}, {'label': 'C', 'text': 'Adults spider population would decrease'}, {'label': 'D', 'text': 'Adult spider population would increase.'}])
